hero.subtitle: Precision fabrication, premium finishing, and reliable delivery

capabilities.title: Production Capabilities
capabilities.description1: Arkan Al-Tafawuq Production House delivers end-to-end fabrication and print solutions—covering acrylic, wood, metal, and composite works with a fully equipped workshop. Our capabilities include CNC routing, laser cutting, bending, welding, painting, and meticulous assembly to achieve brand-perfect results.
capabilities.description2: We produce signage, wayfinding systems, retail fixtures, display stands, exhibition booths, 3D props, and custom installations—engineered for durability, clean finishes, and fast installation on site.

printServices.title: Print & Event Services
printServices.description1: Our print division handles large-format, UV, and eco-solvent printing for backdrops, billboards, wall wraps, vehicle branding, and packaging mockups. We also provide LED screen setups, truss & staging, and turnkey event production with on-site installation and dismantling.
printServices.description2: From technical drawings to final handover, we manage timelines, quality control, and safety to keep your activation or fit-out on schedule—every time.

mission.title: Our Commitment
mission.description1: To craft high-quality production deliverables—fabrication, printing, signage, booths, and event setups—through precise engineering, robust materials, and disciplined project management.
mission.description2: We align with brand guidelines, optimize costs and lead times, and maintain rigorous QC at each stage—from cutting and finishing to packaging and installation—ensuring flawless results on site.

vision.title: Our Future
vision.description1: To be the region's most trusted production partner for brands and agencies—known for reliability, innovation, and premium finishing.
vision.description2: We invest in advanced machinery, materials, and talent to expand capacity, elevate standards, and deliver sustainable, scalable production at speed.

values.subtitle: OUR VALUES
values.title: Excellence Through Values
values.description: The principles that guide our commitment to delivering exceptional production solutions and building lasting partnerships.

testimonials.subtitle: Client Success Stories
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what industry leaders say about working with ARKAN AL-TAFAWUQ.

1.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
1.content: ARKAN AL-TAFAWUQ transformed our brand completely. Their design work increased our customer engagement by 300% and their production excellence generated exceptional results. Simply outstanding!

2.name: Sarah Al-Zahra
2.content: The production quality and attention to detail is unmatched. They delivered our exhibition booth on time and it became the talk of the event. Our sales increased by 200% during the exhibition.

3.name: Mohammed Al-Mansouri
3.content: Working with ARKAN AL-TAFAWUQ was a game-changer for our business. Their strategic approach and creative solutions helped us expand into 5 new markets within 12 months.

4.name: Fatima Al-Sabah
4.content: Their exhibition design and production strategies are phenomenal. We saw exceptional results from their innovative brand activation solutions. They truly understand modern brand experiences.

5.name: Khalid Al-Harbi
5.content: The quality of their production work exceeds all expectations. They handled our complex project with precision and delivered ahead of schedule. Highly recommended for any business.
